mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY e.playerid ASC) AS ROW, (SELECT NAME FROM team t WHERE t.id = p.teamId) teamname, p.position, p.name, e.reason, DATE_FORMAT(e.createDate, '%Y년-%m월-%d일')createDate FROM expulsion e JOIN player p ON p.id = e.playerId;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expulsion(reasion, playerId, createDate) VALUE(#{reasion}, #{playerId}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE expulsion SET name = #{name} WHERE id =#{id}
